plurals.name: atp_TransparencyActivityMultipleRequests
plurals.instruction: Placeholder is the number of requests that are unprotected
plurals.item: %1$d unprotected request in Google Chrome app
%1$d unprotected requests in Google Chrome app

plurals.name: atp_TransparencyActivityMultipleSearches
plurals.instruction: Placeholder is the number of searches that are unprotected
plurals.item: You’ve performed %1$d unsafe search in the Google app.
You’ve performed %1$d unsafe searches in the Google app

resources.string: Using the Google Chrome app to search or browse websites can put your privacy at risk. Google is known to use data like the terms your search for or the links you interact with to create a profile on you.\n\nRead more about Google’s policies here.

Searches in the Google app or using the Google search bar on your homescreen are not private. Google is known to use data like the terms your search for or the links you interact with to create a profile on you.\n\nRead more about Google’s policies here.
Protect yourself by browsing with DuckDuckGo
Protect yourself by searching with DuckDuckGo
